fixes_verified.title: React Circular Dependency Fixed
fixes_verified.verification: selectedRunId removed from deps array. Uses hasUserSelectedRunRef (ref) to track manual selection without triggering re-renders. This is idiomatic React, not a workaround.

positive_observations: D1 fix uses React best practices (refs for non-rendering state)
hasUserSelectedRunRef pattern is clean and minimal
Comments clearly explain the auto-selection logic
validate_iso_timestamp() is simple and focused (no over-engineering)
summary: D1 circular dependency cleanly resolved with idiomatic React ref pattern. No unnecessary complexity introduced. Backend validation is minimal and focused. All tests pass. Ready to merge.
